verbose_text: An important, anti-atherosclerotic role of HDL-C is also in preventing oxidative modification of LDL-C being an initial trigger of atherosclerotic plaque formation, and also its action on blood vessels epithelium which improves its functions by stimulation of nitric oxide production and inhibition of endothelial cells apoptosis [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: HDL-C is also in preventing oxidative modification of LDL-C
